      31             : // This is helper class for transferring OffscreenCanvas to worker thread.
      32             : // Because OffscreenCanvas is not thread-safe. So we cannot pass Offscreen-
      33             : // Canvas to worker thread directly. Thus, we create this helper class and
      34             : // store necessary data in it then pass it to worker thread.
